definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to be convinced (that sth is true)/to believe/to accept sth as true
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow

to strike a pose (Chinese opera)/(fig.) to make a public appearance/to come out in public (revealing one's true personality, opinions etc)/(of a product) to appear on the market or at a trade show etc

sentences.english: And 40 percent said they would be more likely to address issues with their car than their health.
sentences.chinese: 的人说相比较自己的健康他们更喜欢处理车子问题。

sentences.english: Simple cysts are difficult to distinguish from arachnoid cyst or epidermoid.
sentences.chinese: 单纯的囊肿较难与蛛网膜囊肿和表皮样囊肿相鉴别。

sentences.english: Cheng Xi and Tang Zheng sweet took pictures, and to the two original rented house.
sentences.chinese: 程曦和唐正甜蜜的照了相，又到两个原来租住的房子。

sentences.english: A lantern on the boulevard cast a vague light into this poor room.
sentences.chinese: 路旁的一盏回光灯微微照着这里的贫苦相。

sentences.english: NOTE Data should be compared with those of competitors andor appropriate benchmarks .
sentences.chinese: 数据应该与竞争对手和或适当的基准的数据相比较。

sentences.english: A water-base drilling fluid that contains dispersed oil or synthetic hydrocarbon as an internal phase.
sentences.chinese: 分散的油滴或合成烃为内相的水基钻井液。

sentences.english: The existence of large second phases is found to be beneficial to nucleation.
sentences.chinese: 粗大的第二相粒子对再结晶形核具有促进作用。

sentences.english: The pangolin whole body's lamella is its thorn, is similar with the nail.
sentences.chinese: 穿山甲浑身的鳞片就是它的刺，与指甲相类似。

sentences.english: Sweep away all dharmas, and separate from all marks.
In this paper, asymmetric microporous poly (vinylidene fluoride) (PVDF)membranes were prepared by phase-inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用相转换法制备了聚偏氟乙烯不对称微孔膜。

sentences.english: Phase evolution was studied by the synchrotron radiation photoemission technique.
sentences.chinese: 用同步辐射光电子能谱研究了相衍变过程。

sentences.english: The top-down management support should not be confused with the rollout approach.
sentences.chinese: 自顶向下的管理支持不应该与铺展过程相混淆。

sentences.english: Porous ceramics is a kind of inorganic non-metal material that mostly includes pores.
sentences.chinese: 多孔陶瓷是一类以气孔为主相的无机非金属材料。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter mainly discusses its transfer during Wei and Jin dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第五章主要讨论相和歌辞在魏晋时期的转型问题。

sentences.english: A method for division of reservoir petrophysical facies by fuzzy clustering is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了应用模糊聚类划分储集层岩石物理相的方法。

sentences.english: Required services are sometimes called requisitions to help distinguish needs from capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 要求的服务有时被称作请求，以便同功能需要相区分。

definition: to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
